thread.title: Hidden sugars in your everyday diet
thread.title_full: Hidden sugars in your everyday diet - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Hidden sugars in your everyday diet
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - The American diet has become over-saturated with sugar. The American Heart Association recommends no more than 9.5 teaspoons of sugar per day, but the average adult consumes 22 teaspoons of sugar per day and the average child consumes 32 teaspoons. How do we break the sugar cycle?
Dietitian, Kim Evans, of Whole Health Nutrition discusses how.
Watch the video for more information.
